backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing user profile management with authorization checks and a public contact form plus admin-only message viewing.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text mapping of frontend file paths to short functional descriptions for build planning.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining prerequisites and steps for local and mainnet deployment on the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color tokens, theming variables, and base styles including dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, shared layout, and section-based home page.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: React contact form with validation and backend submission via actor and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/navigation/SiteF: Footer component with branding, navigation links, social icons, and smart home/section navigation.
frontend/src/components/navigation/SiteH: Responsive header with scroll effects, navigation links, social icons, and logic to scroll or navigate to sections/pages.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders the About section using artist bio content split into paragraphs.
frontend/src/components/sections/Biograp: Displays a biography section with narrative paragraphs and a milestones timeline sourced from artist content.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Shows a contact section with a brief intro and embedded contact form.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Full‑screen hero section with background image, artist name, tagline, and buttons that scroll to other sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/MusicSe: Lists tracks with Spotify links, includes a CTA to the listen page, and links to full discography.
frontend/src/components/sections/Section: Wrapper component that renders a section element with an id and optional styling.
frontend/src/components/sections/ShowsSe: Displays upcoming and past shows with formatted dates and ticket links.
frontend/src/components/sections/VideosS: Renders a grid of embedded YouTube videos with titles and a link to the full YouTube channel.
frontend/src/content/artistContent.ts: Defines detailed artist metadata including bio, milestones, social links, and track lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements a mutation hook to submit contact messages through the backend actor and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles, CSS variables, themes, and global typography/background settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/ListenPage.tsx: Renders a music listening page with track embeds, back navigation, and a Spotify link.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with typography, container queries, animations, custom OKLCH color tokens, fonts, shadows, and component keyframes.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including artist website details, feature requirements, known issues, and pending feature requests.
